did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Pamphlets, correspondence, notes, news clippings, typescripts of books, a list of illustrations for a book, and plaques.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Pamphlets, notes, and correspondence concerning World's Fairs and Expositions, ca.1894-1968; correspondence and pamphlets concerning Cornell University, ca.1931-1968; pamphlets, correspondence, notes, news clippings, typescripts of books, and a list of illustrations for a book; and five plaques of Frank Monaghan.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Frank Monaghan (Cornell University Class of 1927, M.S. 1928) was a Professor of History at New York University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Pamphlets, notes, and correspondence concerning World's Fairs and Expositions, ca.1894-1968; correspondence and pamphlets concerning Cornell University, ca.1931-1968; pamphlets, correspondence, notes, news clippings, typescripts of books, and a list of illustrations for a book; and five plaques of Frank Monaghan.
A large portion of the material is in French.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Frank Monaghan papers, #3085. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: SF-File on World's Fairs and Expositions, ca. 1894-1968, pamphlets, notes, correspondence
Misc. folders re: Cornell, ca. 1931-1968, correspondence, pamphlets
Typescripts mss. for two books, misc. pamphlets, correspondence, notes
Misc. notes, photos, correspondence, news clippings re: the book or books in Box 1
